ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can cream of chicken soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup
2 large cooked chicken breasts, cut into cubes

gear.name: Cast iron skillet or baking dish

cookingTips: Drain canned vegetables well to prevent excess liquid from making pot pie soggy
Combine both soups and vegetables to create rich, flavorful filling
Arrange biscuit dough on top of hot filling just before baking; biscuits will puff and brown as pot pie bakes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the best way to arrange and bake biscuit dough on top of a hot filling to ensure it cooks through without burning?
